editions.effect:
%%As an additional cost to activate this card, rest your champion.%

[Class Bonus] You may activate this card from your graveyard. If you do, banish it as it resolves.

[Class Bonus] You may activate this card from your banishment. If you do, put it on the bottom of your deck as it resolves.

%%**Glimpse 2** and **recover 2**.%
editions.effect_raw:
As an additional cost to activate this card, rest your champion.

[Class Bonus] You may activate this card from your graveyard. If you do, banish it as it resolves.

[Class Bonus] You may activate this card from your banishment. If you do, put it on the bottom of your deck as it resolves.

Glimpse 2 and recover 2.

rule.description: If Three Visits is in a banishment and is then turned face down due to an effect like Orb of Sealing's, its owner can still activate it because that player is allowed to look at that card and see the ability that grants the activation permission.

rule.title: ERRATA
rule.description: As an additional cost to activate this card, rest your champion.

rule.title: ERRATA
rule.description: 'Rest your champion. If you do, glimpse 2 and recover 2. -> Glimpse 2 and recover 2.'
If Three Visits were to be negated, it will go to the zone it would have gone to if it had resolved.
